text:
Reporting queued error: faulting application Apache.exe, version 2.0.59.200, 
faulting module ntdll.dll, version 5.2.3790.1830, fault address 0x00022583.

I get this error ever time I attempt to run an apache -k restart.  It appears 
as the web server restarts properly, but this error always appears in the event 
viewer.
creator: Richard_Schoenig@picis.com

text:
http://httpd.apache.org/dev/debugging.html provides information about getting
a backtrace
creator: wrowe@apache.org
wrowe@apache.org
text:
Closing until a backtrace is obtained (please reopen when you have one).

Note it's unrelated to pr 52581 so /please/ correct the subject when reopening.
